As his big toe thrusts toward you, your mouth opens instinctively and latches onto its hardened skin. Biting down with the same force you’d employ for a frozen Snickers bar, your teeth sink through the dead crust and into the softer tissue below. A gush of warm liquid bursts from the superficial wound. Your chin is covered in the sticky, red fluid; you immediately realise by the familiar taste that it’s blood. Orlando simultaneously yells “Ouch!”, and extracts his foot from the ugg boot.

You begin to tumble as though being dumped by a giant wave. Bouncing and somersaulting from wall to wall, you imagine he’s tipping your woolly hideaway upside down to remove the offending creature that bit him. In one sudden jerk, your body flies out and lands on a dirty sock. The garment is protruding from under a bedside table, but unlike the brand new ugg, it is well worn and emits a putrid odour.

You can see Orlando clearly now. He’s hopping on one foot while cradling the other, and appears to be searching the floor for anything that even looks like a spider. He suddenly shouts “Gotcha!”at a black ball of fluff and stomps it with his good foot. Relieved, you realise that he mustn’t possess 20/20 vision. Ashton, used to being worshipped, confidently takes a glass from the silver tray and winks at the waitress. She blushes, and he starts casual conversation with his admirer, stirring his drink. What the unwitting young lady hasn't noticed is that Ashton has discarded the fruit slice-decorated toothpick which she assumes he is using to stir his drink, and is now dangling your puny, helpless body by the waist and using your upper body to mix his alcohol. Your head and arms are pulled around, around, the strong, chemical-tasting alcohol burning your throat and freezing your skin. You're practically drowning in the whirlpool of tropical yellow liquid that washes around you. You're so dizzy with the motion, and the influence of the alcohol, you've lost all sense of time and direction. You feel cool air hit your face again, and Ashton's deep voice, which was a vague grumble from inside the drink, has returned to its booming resonance. You open your eyes, the world colourful and spinning, and see Ashton's huge, equine jaw and wet lips before you. The glass touches them, he takes a slurp of the cocktail, his Addam's apple bobs.. "Well, you and your room mates can drop by the set any time.." He's saying. The waitress's giggle echoes; dances around your ears. You sway, Ashton's lips seeming to grow bigger and bigger. They're wet, full, and smirking now. That's when you realise that they 'are' growing bigger - you're headed for the giant's mouth. As Ashton pretends to bite the fruit from the end of his 'toothpick', which the horny cocktail waitress is far too intoxicated with desire to look at now, he deliberately forces you past his giant, red lips. As Drake walks, the friction from his denim jeans leaves your skin feeling so raw and sensitive that when he finally pulls u out, a slight breeze makes u feel like your whole body's on fire, and you hug yourself, trembling helplessly.

"You see what I mean?" says Drake, pinching your body between his thumb and index finger as he holds a beer in the other hand. "Is that cute or what?" Orlando laughs with Drake and the two take up conversation, ignoring you as if you were a particularly interesting but unimportant photograph that was lucky enough to hold their attention for a moment.

You make a risky decision and wrench yourself from the callous boy's grip, bouncing on his clean white puma and landing at his feet. Before u even get off your back, Drake has easily shuffled his left foot over you and pinned you to the ground. He glances down with a slight sneer and snicker and resumes his conversation, pressing down so hard that you can barely breathe, and can't utter a single word of plea to the all-powerful giant.
